name: Marcos Augusto Menezes Vieira
content: Marcos Augusto M. Vieira Marcos Augusto M. Vieira Professor at Computer Science Department (Departamento de Ciência da Computação) at Federal University of Minas Gerais (Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais). Federal University of Minas Gerais is the number one school in Computer Science in South America. Post-Doctoral Visiting Research at University of Southern California, Los Angeles. PhD in Computer Science, University of Southern California, Los Angeles. If you are interested in doing PhD, please send me an email. Se tiver interesse em fazer doutorado na área de Redes, favor mandar um e-mail para mim: mmvieira {at} dcc{dot}ufmg{dot}br Página no Google Scholar Publications Currículo Lattes (CNPq).
